translations.translation: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,
those who firmly believe in the Day of Recompense,
who acknowledge the Day of Judgment,
And those who believe the Day of Judgement to be true.
And those who believe in the Day of Recompense.
And those who accept the truth of the judgment day
who confirm the Day of Doom
And those who believe in the Day of Judgment,
and those who believe in the Day of Judgement
And those who testify to the Day of Requital.
and who affirm the Day of Retribution,
And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment;
And those who believe in the Day of Recompense,
who confirm the Day of Reckoning
And those who affirm the Day of Judgment.
And those who believe in the Day of Recompense
[70:26]   and who affirm the truth of the Day of Judgement, [of] Requital,
(And those who believe in the Day of Judgement) and those who believe in the Day of Reckoning and all that which is in it,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ } ويعتقدون { بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ } [المعارج: 26] تصديقاً مقارناً بصوالح الأعمال، ومحاسن الشيم والأخلاق
